title: Teaching Ethics in Appalachia Taught Me About Bridging America’s Partisan D
excerpt: There’s a language for talking about hot-button issues. And we’re not learning it.

title: What I learned from a Taipei alley — Remains of the Day
excerpt: I was in Taipei the past few weeks working on a documentary with friends. Because of a busy schedule, it wasn't like my usual travels abroad for fun, it felt more like a work trip. Still, even if I'd been there purely for vacation, I would've wanted to try a different mode of travel, one less focuse
